description: Aspose.Words for .NET class library supports DOC, DOCX, RTF, HTML, OpenDocument, PDF, XPS, EPUB and other formats. With Aspose.Words you can generate, modify, convert, render and print documents without utilizing Microsoft Word®
releaseNotes:
There are 174 improvements and fixes in this regular monthly release. The most notable are:

• DrawingML SmartArt (Diagrams) are now rendered.
• Multiple enhancements in DrawingML Charts rendering.
• Different text directions are supported in DrawingML textboxes rendering.
• Optimized output of PDF files.

This release introduces the new features, enhancements and fixes to the excptions, bugs and regressions as detailed below:

• New features

WORDSJAVA-562	Support enhanced effects for DrawingML pictures
WORDSNET-4171	Index field is lost after open/save ODT document
WORDSNET-4213	Background color is missing after open/save odt document
WORDSNET-4332	Support Tight wrapping style during rendering.
WORDSNET-4333	Support through wrapping style during rendering.
WORDSNET-5343	Configure to build AWNET Debug configuration
WORDSNET-6041	/tight wrapping/ While converting docx to Pdf, first page is incorrectly positioned on second page.
WORDSNET-6713	/through wrapping/ Docx to Pdf conversion issue with TextBoxes positions
WORDSNET-6795	Support list-style-type attribute of HTML ordered list
WORDSNET-7112	OOXML Diagrams // SmartArt objects are not preserved in PDF
WORDSNET-7138	Support multiLvlStrRef upon rendering charts.
WORDSNET-7243	Support render legend markers in data labels.
WORDSNET-7262	Support rendering of minor grid lines.
WORDSNET-7299	Support style:color attribute of anchor tag
WORDSNET-7300	Support style:text-decoration attribute of anchor tag
WORDSNET-7319	Implement gradient brush transformation during 3d transformation of front/back faces.
WORDSNET-7357	Support dml text direction and rotation
WORDSNET-7365	Support rendering of up-down bars.
WORDSNET-7366	Support rendering high-low lines.
WORDSNET-7395	Scaling GIF images
WORDSNET-7396	Render OOXML diagrams using data in drawingN.xml.
